name: Latchel
description: Human-like AI that handles tenant texts, maintenance requests, and updates 24/7.
target_audience_match: Best for landlords who feel chained to their phone and want tenant texts handled without sounding cold.

name: Innago AI Assistant
description: Free property management platform with built-in AI messaging that mimics your tone.
target_audience_match: Perfect for solo landlords tired of writing replies from scratch — and not wanting to pay for it.

name: AppFolio AI Leasing Assistant
description: Conversational AI that answers tenant questions instantly and books showings.
target_audience_match: Great for growing PMs who can’t afford delays but want responses to still feel human.

name: Tennille by Hemlane
description: AI assistant that manages tenant relations with empathy-focused replies.
target_audience_match: Right for emotionally-aware landlords who don’t want to seem distant, even when they’re off duty.

name: HelloData
description: AI inbox and CRM that crafts friendly replies across platforms, synced to your tone.
target_audience_match: Ideal for tech-savvy hosts juggling channels but still wanting every message to sound personal.
